title: How to Fold an Origami Water Lily

steps.title: Use a square piece of paper.
steps.content: Use a square piece of paper. Fold it diagonally one way and then the other diagonal way. Unfold.

steps.title: Fold in the corners to the middle where the diagonal creases intersect.
steps.content: Fold in the corners to the middle where the diagonal creases intersect.

steps.title: Fold in the corners two more times.
steps.content: Fold in the corners two more times.

steps.title: Unfold the outermost flaps partway.
steps.content: Unfold the outermost flaps partway. Do the same with the 2 more sets of flaps. You may have to crease the flaps to make them stay up.

steps.title: Enjoy your simple (but squarish) origami water lily.
steps.content: Enjoy your simple (but squarish) origami water lily.
